name: Hamna Zaidi

name: Miles Warren
text: Good stuff, nice people

name: Nichole Kenworthy
text: Every where online and in the store it says closes at 10 but we were informed that at 840 they were closing in 20 min after already paying for the buffet. So we had old pizza and were rushed to eat so they could clean and close. Don't think I'll be back. Just felt like I was unwanted and a burden.

name: Regan King
text: This place is horrible... food was definitely way below average, and when I ordered a personalized pizza from them... they made it wrong.  Drink tasted like cleaning fluid, which as much as I appreciate the cleaning, tasted pretty off.  The manager here obviously does not care if this place is good or not... pretty sad.

name: Michele Laporte
text: We were not happy about the cleanliness of the restaurant, the game room not clean the bathroom dirty and the walls need some attention. Not a clean place. I was upset and did not want to eat my daughter just eat some pieces of bread ‚Ä¶More

name: Mary Ann Edwards
text: Plenty of parking, and restrooms available. Prices were very reasonable and kids under 4 eat free. Include salad bar, multiple types of pizza, and dessert. Drinks cost extra. Can order your own special pizza. Who tended to be a little bit on the bland side, but salad bar items were fresh.

name: Adam Bargiel
text: Food was pretty good. It's close to Flint, so expect not the best crowd at times. Place was not very busy when we were there, yet it was kind of messy and run down looking. Pizza buffet is always a good idea. Could see more here with good management.

name: Kenneth Beck
text: Great place with great prices. one of the few pizza buffet places that is around. It is not the best pizza in the world but there is a good selection and they will make custom pizzas just for you that they bring right to your table. Wish there was more of these in Michigan...

name: Topcover73
text: Not terrible but not great either. Food was typical buffet food, slightly above average I'd say. Service was actually very good though. The biggest issue was they had the air conditioning up way too high and my food got too cold too fast. Otherwise decent place to take a family on the cheap.

name: Monte Mcmillan
text: Seems like they're under new (and inexperienced) management. I haven't been here since they made everything disposable, with the exception of the plates. But this change is nothing compared to the crazy notion that someone can come in here ‚Ä¶More

name: Trey VanWieren
text: Food and staff were good, but the buffet selection was lacking. All the food was fresh and tasted good, but the variety of pizzas was pretty basic. They only really had your standard cheese, pepporoni, all-meat, etc. that all pizza places ‚Ä¶More

name: Michael Hodges
text: Always good pizza. Less expensive prices. You have to ask them to make what kind of pizza you want to eat but at least its hit and fresh

name: Nathaniel Johnson
text: It was cool, had so much pizza I didn't even get dessert smh.. That was my fault tho, ate too much. Reasonably priced, customer service is not bad either. Who can argue with endless pizza??

name: Josh Beckwith
text: Decent pizza at a great price.  It was busy when we went so they had a hard time keeping  everything out.  Still a good time I just waiting until what I wanted was fresh and pounced

name: Zach
text: Love coming here. Have been here many times and the food is great. Unlimited food that tastes is great is something that can't be turned down. The cost is high if you don't eat a pizza worth.

name: Kevin
text: It's coming back to how it used to be. They have a new general manager and things are fresh and taste good. He's doing a good job turning it around.

name: Ballistic BigEar
text: Pretty good pizza for a quick bite but I loved the balsamic glaze flat bread they had also better Alfredo sauce then I've ever had other than my parents. Very good but if I had to compare to mod Pizza...MOD allllll day

name: Devin Taylor
text: It was good for the price of all you can eat buffet. But I feel the pizza could be a little better. Kind of a cardboard vibe to it.

name: Hyxie
text: For an all you can buffet of pizza, pasta, Salad, and dessert for $5.49 (+tax and a drink being $1.89) it sounds like a deal you can't beat. There are plenty of people love pizza üçï and that holds true to any pie, but --as with many ‚Ä¶More

name: Michelle McKenna
text: Pizza was only ok the noodles were over cooked and the brownies were inedible even though the manager insisted that they weren't under cooked. We won't be going back this was the last chance for the new owners really wish the old ones were still there everything was always good before they left.

name: Alexis Styles
text: I love the pizza. But it's too far off a drive wish there was more locations open. And it was a little cleaner. Great staff they put fresh hot pizza out quickly.

name: Crystal Hurteau
text: If you have small children then this is the place for you! Kids can get up and move around plus pick whatever food they want. Prices are super good so it is affordable to take the family. Small arcade is in the restaurant too so gives kids something else to do.

name: T Harris
text: Come on! All you can eat pizza!  It was affordable and had a nice friendly atmosphere. The type of place you wouldn't mind bringing your kids. The only thing bad I can think about is they close the closest one to me down. Now if I want Cicis I will have to travel 2 hours to get it.

name: Fred Smith
text: Awesome service and the food was hot and fresh! It‚Äôs been about a month since I have been there and was worried what I was going to walk into. I have to say there have been major changes.  Everyone was so nice and friendly. The place was ‚Ä¶More

text: Excellent pizza, and great service! This is our second visit, and we have not been disappointed. We discovered today that you can create your own pizza, that was a big hit with our son...and my husband too!

text: You pretty much get what you pay for. For $6.29 a person you get unlimited pizza that isn't great in a crowded restaurant that could probably use a good scrubbing. Overall, okay if you go in with low expectations.

name: Jennifer Schilling-Shaw
text: Good place friendly family environment so expect kids. loved hearing the positive Christian music. pizza could use more cheese though

name: Dona D

name: Lux Beltran
text: Walking into this place I didn't expect the interior to be so open. You can see every diner from whichever seat you take. I was very comfortable hanging out with coworkers when dining in. Most of my purchase are carry out. Overall, for quick sit down meals this is the place to go.

name: Tera Lacy

text: I haven't forgotten about you haven't been your way will be soon. Thanks for all the help your hostesses and chefs gave us. We had a party of 38.

text: All-you-can-eat pizza is always a hit with my kids. They love the food, the arcade, and the cartoons that they play on the tvs. I'm not a huge fan personally. The pizzas are all very thin with little toppings.

text: Love the selection of pizzas, really like the salad bar, and can't beat the price for all this.

name: Bonnie Miller
text: Wasn't very clean. There was nothing in the salad bar when we came in. I like the pizza it was pretty good! :-) needs a lot more help with maintaining the supplies.

name: Tonya Hauxwell
text: Love This place.  My boys and I have been coming here since they open.  My son favorite is the Mac and cheese pizza and my other son favorite is the spinach. This one is always so clean and the workers are so nice.

name: Bryan Koski
text: Cheap pizza. There is everything from super thin to just about thick (I only saw one thick one). Liked the spinach and cheese. The cheesecake pizza for dessert is pretty damn tasty.

name: Katrina Ouimette
text: Great for kids. Basic pizza buffet. Nothing special. Good price. Seems to have went downhill in the last year tho..

name: Brian Angell
text: If you like pizza, (who doesn't?) then you can't go wrong with Cici's. They have a wide variety of pizza, good pasta, salad, and desserts. The rewards program is a little bit confusing, but the food is good.

name: Jonathan Bershas
text: Great Value and selection. Fresh salads, any pizza you can come up with, and great desserts. Polite courteous and helpful staff.

text: While many may down CiCi's pizza as a lack-luster all-you-can-eat buffet, I've found that it's all in your approach to their menu. The salad bar, pizzas, and staff add up to an excellent value. When in doubt, get creative. ‚Ä¶More

text: The food was great. We enjoyed ourselves, and it wasn't crowded considering it was father's day. On the down side, the wings we ordered took forever to finally arrive at our table. Considering that nobody else had ordered wings and the place wasn't crowded, this delay made no sense.

name: Christine Ames
